alert.note: Alert for Green; Iowa; Lafayette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 9:08PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lafayette, Green, eastern Iowa, Rock, southeastern Columbia, Dane and southeastern Sauk Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 907 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mazomanie to 7 miles west of Mount Horeb to near Warren. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Janesville, Beloit, Sun Prairie, Fitchburg, Middleton, Stoughton, Waunakee, Monroe, Verona, Oregon, McFarland, Monona, Mount Horeb, Windsor, Edgerton, Evansville, Columbus, Prairie Du Sac and Marshall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.
